reviews.review_msg: Dr. Wong is extremely intelligent and professional and I always enjoyed her seminars that were full of really helpful classroom activities and discussions. You have to work hard for a good grade, but she's very clear in her expectations of students. Her course was probably the hardest I've ever taken, but I also enjoyed it immensely.
A terrible prof. Would not recommend. Expect 60-100 pages of readings a week. Dont bother taking this course if youre planning on taking 4 classes.
